channel.title: TextHandler and Clicking most problem
channel.description: Hello all im useing richscape v2 i wanted to remake quest tab and saw there is text handler i searched tought all source the codes who are writed in the textHandler but couldnt find em.. Same problem with clicking most but some of clcking most buttons are in client java ending.. So i asking help from you Moparscapians i want to ask to you post me a newer version of Richscape or give me some code's Just theese two problems for now.

So i want to make excellent project with it just need some help…
